reviews.review_msg: great prof. great science. particle physics is cool!

I'm honestly surprised he received such high opinions from Phys 120 students, because in 485 it was not great. He only read off his slides and most times one equation took up 50%. Granted, that's not his fault, but chalkboard lectures would have been a lot more helpful in this class. Most days it was a struggle for everyone to stay awake.
